name: Terracotta Warriors & Huaqing Hotspring
description:
his tour covers a lot of ground outside of Xi'an, visiting the Terracotta Warriors, Huaqing Hotspring and stopping at a countryside cave dwelling for a home cooked lunch. 

We can customize this tour itinerary for you and can add a hotel, train or plane tickets. The countryside cave option can be changed for lunch in a Chinese restaurant if you prefer.
